sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import getDate from "../GetDate/GetDate" import Comment from "../Comments/Comment" import appStyle from "../../App.scss" import MainVideoDisplayStyle from "../MainVideoDisplay/MainVideoDisplay.scss" import Like from "../../assets/Icons/Icon-likes.svg" import Views from "../../assets/Icons/Icon-views.svg" function mainEntry(props) { if (props.entry===null){ return "" } return (

{props.entry.title}

By {props.entry.channel}

{getDate(props.entry.timestamp)} ago

{props.entry.views}

{props.entry.likes}

{props.entry.description}

{props.entry.comments.length} Comments

{props.entry.comments.map((comment) =>(
  • {comment.name}{getDate(comment.timestamp)} ago
  • {comment.comment}
))}
) } export default mainEntry
